 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂרֹק‎</span>] **adjective** perhaps ==sorrel== (? from II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span>, or compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***having ruddy tinge*** over white, of horses ***sorrel*** [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>1581</sup>); — plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲדֻמִּים שְׂרֻקִּים וּלְבָנִים‎</span> [[Zech.1.8|Zech 1:8]]. of horses.
